results.content: Expected to have more valuable content by reading the course title. Watched to the end and found that everything was easily browsable within few web pages. No valuable content or really good tips on how to build reliable backends at all.... Cannot recommend others to buy this course at this moment. Expect the instructor to improve a lot before rating more stars

results.content: Sid was a great instructor. I could tell he really understood the subject matter. I feel like I have a sound understanding of the basics of Django. Now I'm off to create my own app and try to take over the world!
results.content_html: Sid was a great instructor. I could tell he really understood the subject matter. I feel like I have a sound understanding of the basics of Django. Now I'm off to create my own app and try to take over the world!

results.content:
I would take this course before any other course on Django.
This is course is very well thought out.  Sid gives the theory and basics of how Django works and then explains and shows you how to use it while creating a simple application.  After this course I feel I have a strong grasp on how Django works so I can continue learning with a solid foundation.
I look forward to more lectures and courses from Sid. Keep up the good work.
results.content_html:
I would take this course before any other course on Django.

I look forward to more lectures and courses from Sid. Keep up the good work.

results.content:
I had 400 +  courses subscribed from udemy, this is one of the best and easy to follow.

The author talks to the point in explaining the subject.

I can practically watch the videos at one screen and start developing the application in other screen.

Pls come out with more python development videos. Python plays big role in Big data projects.

results.content: It is sad to see that the instructor didn't correct the course, however he know that an important part was missing. It is also sad to see udemy letting things like this happens.  I am disappointed and I will be more careful in paying for any future course.
